hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Umamah said:"The Prophet(ﷺ) passed by a man who was sleeping in the masjid, lying on his face. He struck him with his foot and said: 'Get up' or; 'Sit up, fo this is a hellish kind of sleep

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الاِضْطِجَاعِ، عَلَى الْوَجْهِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of lying's on one's face
